spec_data.Name: vdsm
spec_data.Description:
The VDSM service is required by a Virtualization Manager to manage the
Linux hosts. VDSM manages and monitors the host's storage, memory and
networks as well as virtual machine creation, other host administration
tasks, statistics gathering, and log collection.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 03:25:15 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
